Package gui

Class HomePanel

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
gui.HomePanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class HomePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements Observer
Class that represents home panel, from which other activities are launched.
Since:
22.06.2020.

  • Method Details

    • updatePerformed

      public void updatePerformed​(UpdateEvent e)
      Function that needs to be defined after implementing the Observer interface.
      Specified by:
      updatePerformed in interface Observer
      Parameters:
      e - if the event's source is CurrencyManager, currency box's content is updated. If the source is ActivityManager, current balance display is updated. If the source is SettingsManager, buttons' tooltips are updated according to the specified language.

    • setUpEditorPane

      private javax.swing.JEditorPane setUpEditorPane()
      Function that sets up editorPane used in help button's JOptionPane.
      Returns:
      editorPane with HyperLinkListener.

      Function that tries to open the uri passed from openWebpage(URL) function.
      Parameters:
      uri - URI
      Returns:
      indicator whether the uri was opened successfully.

    • openWebpage

      private boolean openWebpage​(java.net.URL url)
      Function that tries to open url.
      Parameters:
      url - url passed from JEditorPane's HyperLinkListener
      Returns:
      indicator whether the url was opened successfully.
